        ungroup()

#Get Number of offender per victim
raw_offender_count <- raw2_offender %>%
              count(incident_id, victim_seq_num, offender_seq_num) %>% #Get the number of unique SEQ_NUM
              filter(offender_seq_num != 0) %>% #Filter out the unknown person
              group_by(incident_id, victim_seq_num) %>%
              summarise(num_offender_per_victim = n()) %>%
              ungroup()


#Get the count of gender
final_offender_gender <- raw2_offender %>%
        count(incident_id, victim_seq_num, sex_code_offender2) %>%
        spread(sex_code_offender2, n, fill=0) %>%
        select(incident_id, victim_seq_num, count_male_offender = `1`, count_female_offender = `2`) %>%
        ungroup()

#Get the count of race
final_offender_race <- raw2_offender %>%
        mutate(race_code_offender3 = case_when(race_code_offender2 == 1 ~ "count_white_offender",

        count(incident_id, victim_seq_num, race_code_offender3) %>%
        spread(race_code_offender3, n, fill=0) %>%
        select(incident_id, victim_seq_num, count_white_offender, count_black_offender, count_othrace_offender) %>%
        ungroup()
